rukus.text: candran tanneyana satyam; at atine tutarnn varumpeal
pakaline tanneyana satyam; at atine (suryane) pratyaksappetuttumpel
ratriye tanneyana satyam; at atine mutumpeal
akasatteyum, atine sthapicca ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
bhumiyeyum, atine vistrtamakkiya ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
manusyastitvatteyum atine sanvidhanicca ritiyeyum tanneyana satyam
ennitt atinn atinre dustatayum atinre suksmatayum sambandhicc avan beadham nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
thamud geatram atinre dhikkaram mulam (satyatte) nisedhiccu tallukayuntayi
avarute kuttattile erravum dustatayullavan orunni purappetta sandarbham
appeal allahuvinre dutan avareat parannu. allahuvinre ottakatteyum atinre vellam kutiyum ninnal suksikkuka

appeal avar addehatte nisedhiccu tallukayum atine (ottakatte) arukeala natattukayum ceytu. appeal avarute papam nimittam avarute raksitav avarkk samula nasam varuttukayum (avarkkellam) at samamakkukayum ceytu
